website_summaries.verdict: This stylish appliance gives you a great-tasting cup of joe – perfect for the coffee connoisseur.
pros: We love how easy this coffee maker is to program, even for the technophobic
Heats water to the perfect brewing temperature for delicious coffee every time – it's even certified by the Specialty Coffee Association
cons: If you leave pot on the warming plate, the coffee can taste scorched

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee maker made
customer_reviews.text: Best Coffee maker made. I had a bunn for 33 years it finally give up. still have it. Just cant part with it. It Just wont heat water hot any more. I tried a MR Coffee. 2 brand new ones lasted 3 weeks each then only would make 3 cups then quit. The bunn does not spill water when you fill it and will take it fast with no problems. It also fits in the corner very tight. Have a cup of coffee on me Have Good Day!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: NOT A BUNN
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A BUNN - Bunn Is known for having a tank that allows for INSTANT coffee - pour water - out comes coffee - THIS DOES NOT HAVE A TANK - YOU WAIT - JUST ANOTHER COFFEE MAKER - KNOCK OFF - NOT like the regular Bunn with tank that holds water so you always have hot water allowing instant brewing VERY DISSAPPOINTED paid same price for Bunn with tank - got a cheap coffee pot - box in trash can't return - lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: mc-ga

customer_reviews.title: Love It - SILENT!
customer_reviews.text: Have been a Bunn user for a long time and wanted an option with a scheduled brewing option since most other options don't have that and it still takes a little while to brew. Plus this is probably more energy efficient. I had this style of Bunn a few years ago and actually threw it away because it was super loud while brewing and woke me / my family up all the way from the kitchen when it started brewing. Fortunately, this one doesn't have that problem and is virtually silent when brewing which was a huge relief when I first used it. Great product, great coffee, quiet performance.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M. Zinda

customer_reviews.title: Horrible second pot
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't brew the coffee, Water isn't at brewing temp. Film builds up you have to take apart tiny screws to clean once a month. Bunn sent me a new on same thing. Filter system is bad and not a good brew.
customer_reviews.author: patty frey

customer_reviews.title: Clogging water-dispensing disc may  lead to brew problems.
customer_reviews.text: This is a contemporary looking spin on an old favorite coffee maker. That said, the inner-workings appear to be of less quality than the original. Specifically, there is a chartreuse colored disc that spin-mounts to the water dispensary area below the filter basket, which becomes clogged (with minerals from the water?) at every brew. It requires a slight dismantling of the unit for rinsing before EVERY brew cycle. I have read that this is a known problem with this model & that there is a different (metal) substitute disc available for purchase through Bunn Parts Department, but I haven't pursued it, yet.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Dunkin Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a cup of coffee that tastes like Starbucks or your own French Press, this is not it. Even with the best beans and multiple grinds the resulting coffee lacks any flavor depth and has a plastic blandness to it. My search for a drip machine continues - however, of the drips I’ve owned this one is the most sturdy and makes a better cup of coffee than similarly priced drips. If your go-to coffee is Dunkin Donuts, you’ll love this machines ease of use and solid carafe and construction.
customer_reviews.author: loboman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. This coffee maker does not store hot water like normal Bunn coffee makers. It simply heats the water before it brews it. This will extend the brew time but doesn't waste electricity by keeping 12 cups of water hot at all times. The pot and maker are very well built. The maker handles my soft water great as previous Bunn coffee makers I've owned overflow coffee grounds all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Emily McCall

customer_reviews.title: Makes awful tasting coffee!
customer_reviews.text: We have had Bunn's in the past, so thought we would try one again. It was absolutely a joke! Tasted horrible! Used a lot of coffee. Did not heat up to the 195* it said it would. Never kept it long enough to have to clean it. So can not give an opinion on that. Would not recommend spending any amount of money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Girl

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a lemon?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have already thrown it away. It worked for a few days but then started to brew extremely slow!! The last pot I had made actually took an hour and a half! I gave it one star just because I have always used Bunn coffee pots and I still will. Have never had an issue before this one but this was my first programmable one. In fact, I never threw out my last Bunn so I am back to my old one and am a happy coffee drinker again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ware

customer_reviews.title: Almost a Great Coffee Maker but...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased coffee maker Jan 23rd 2020. Made really good coffee. Style was very nice. However, the green plastic coffee aerator broke off on Feb 26th. This fragile little plastic part fits above the filter which allows the hot water from the tank to spread over the coffee grounds making the coffee rich and wonderful. Without it the coffee is watered down. Disappointed this happened on a new unit. Do better Bunn!
customer_reviews.author: jerry321

customer_reviews.title: Order directly from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product from Amazon. Upon receiving it and setting up the automatic brew cycle, I found that the cycle did not work properly. When I called BUNN and gave customer service the proper numbers on the unit, it was discovered that this product was from 2018. Sitting in a warehouse for over a year. BUNN honored the purchase, sent a new product which works beautifully now. LOVE BUNN and its customer service--not as happy with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: It makes fine coffee. I typically brew a pot and may not get to drinking all of it for a few hours, however. The warmer turns off after two hours and if you press the brew button to turn it back on, it will display an error message due to there being no water. The warmer does not turn on and the only way to get rid of the error message and put the coffee maker back into a working state, is to unplug it completely. This resets the clock and the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto Start Function Fail
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker does not have a sensor letting the machine know if the carafe is in place or not. Therefore when you set the auto start function to brew, it is going to brew whether or not the carafe is in or not. With that said I woke up to my coffee maker having brewed an entire pot of coffee all over the floor of my apartment and ruining my hardwood floors. This is a very basic, fundamental function that Bunn has skipped with this coffee maker. Now I have property damage and will be filing a claim further with Bunn for their engineering negligence.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China very sad about that
customer_reviews.text: Brews great coffee, I am very happy with the product. It takes six minutes to heat the water up and then starts the drip process. Cooks the coffee at a higher temperature and I will say it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot is replacing a Bonavita that quit working week two of the Texas Stay at Home order. Yikes. I really like the heat to temp of the water before brewing - probably one of the best cups of coffee I've had and at a reasonable price. I only brew 4 cups at a time so I am pouring the last 2 pretty quick when the coffee is still hot and have not experienced any steam issues when pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mav

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker made exactly two pots of coffee and quit working. It was made in china, so the Bunn quality was not in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Redesigned, this is a huge improvement for Bunn!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had been designed just a bit better as far as the carafe & plastic lid, specifically the lid part that sits directly on top of the glass carafe. It falls out of place very easily. I do like the overall quality, its taller than my old pot, so do measure your counter top vs cabinet height, to make sure it will fit. Love the location of the front fill, and it brews a nice stout strength. Could brew hotter, but I like my coffee steaming hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I had been using a Cuisinart for at least 10 years prior to this purchase. When the last one died, I took my brother-in-law’s advice and tried this Bunn. This heat and brew was perfect for me, as I didn’t need or want the preheated reservoir. Coffee tastes great, perfect temperature. Love it!! The only improvement I would suggest would be a way to turn the burner back on to keep leftover coffee hot for late risers!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Results
customer_reviews.text: I have gone thru a lot of the lesser brands and low cost coffee makers over the years, many not even lasting a full year before failing in one way or another. So far this machine has proved reliable and more efficient at delivering me decent pots of coffee every day. It cost more than the cheap ones, so that It will have to keep doing this for another 3-4 years but so far I can see little that could go wrong with its design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. The temp that it brews makes the coffee taste so much richer using same coffee brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Damery

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee and the best warranty service ever!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker works great but is slower than the KitchenAid it replaced. It is much easier to clean. After 11 months of daily use the tank holding the brewing water stopped draining properly (completely). I called customer service at Bunn and explained my problem to Jim. Without any questions, he said a new replacement unit would be shipped to me immediately-and it was. Great warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: John Long

customer_reviews.title: Solid Functioning, No Frills Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker brews great coffee. It does what it's supposed to do without any frills...unless you think a clock and programmable start timer are frills. Do I think it's slightly over priced? Yes. Did I pay extra for the SCAA certification and Bunn brand name? Yes. A couple things to note are that it's much lighter than I expected, but that doesn't impact the performance. It's also taller than some other coffee makers, but anyone complaining that it doesn't fit on their kitchen counter under a cabinet didn't do any simple research on the product before purchasing. With all this being said, would I buy it again? Definitely.
customer_reviews.author: UTank

customer_reviews.title: Shuts down completely
customer_reviews.text: It stops working when it states it needs to be cleaned. I’ve no problem with the advisory warning - but STOPS WORKING completely - no option to override or anything. Couldn’t be more frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: It produces great coffee as advertised. I was just a little disappointed that the water reservoir tends to fill beyond the capacity of the filters. So, the grounds wind up clinging to the upper sides of the basket. But, they don't appear to make their way into the carafe. It's more of a cleaning annoyance that anything. All in all I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: captken00

customer_reviews.title: bunn coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a bunn coffee maker and with some extra cash this year I decided to purchase one..I love this Coffee maker.It has a timer so the coffee is ready when I get up to go to work and it shuts off so I don't have to worry about leaving it on if I go away...Great product and it arrived quickly..thanks
customer_reviews.author: Roberta J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This bunn is made in China but....
customer_reviews.text: We specifically purchased BUNN because it was supposed to be made in the USA. However, it was not and when it arrived it had made in china all over the box :( but we decided to keep it because it is difficult to find a coffee maker with these features made in the USA. BUNN is a US based family owned company so we kept it. It has done great thus far...
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great new size and shape coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: We have had several Bunn machines in the past is unit is so much better. The size is great it's only a couple inches wider than the carafe, and the stand easily fits under the cabinet. This model has a easily programmable timer. It takes about 9 minutes for a full carafe. This is not like the Bunn units that store hot water all the time, it heats each time. It is easy to clean and look good.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES E S

customer_reviews.title: Too simple?
customer_reviews.text: This product is for the simple coffee lover. Don't expect to reheat it if you don't finish all of your coffee, it does not provide that option. It turns on to brew, takes around10 min to finish, keeps it warm (not hot) for 2 hours, and that's it. You can program the start time, but let's hope that is a consistent time for you, everyday. This would be good for an elderly individual but not for a serious coffee drinking family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this coffee maker for a month and it is a total fail. It won't hold water overnight on the preset mode. When you try to brew using the Brew button it does not all come out and when it does it barely drips. It is going back today. Thank goodness Kohl's will box it up and ship for me!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great machine !
customer_reviews.text: Darn good coffee w this machine! And bought it specifically for the auto CUT OFF ! Tired of my wife leaving the coffee pot on all day. This machine put a nail in that issue. Wasted energy is not a small deal long term.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Turman

customer_reviews.title: Has set to brew feature for fresh morning HOT coffee.
customer_reviews.text: We love this Bunn HB Heat N Brew. Very simple to use. Just set the timer & HOT coffee ready to go when we wake up. We have received several comments on the sleek, modern design. We mistakenly ordered two, but decided to keep the extra for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Leonard

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cup, everytime
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever experienced the traditional BUNN brew, this is exactly the same quality with futuristic design and features. I'm so glad BUNN stepped their game up with this unit. I may never need to shop for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Manuallaborer

customer_reviews.title: It is adequate, makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: The heat is ok, I wished it was hotter. Coffee tastes good. I used to have an OXO which had a CRAP temperature gauge and made delicious lukewarm coffee. I need HOT HOT HOT coffee and will stick with this for a while...
customer_reviews.author: Sean Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Better than Moccamaster
customer_reviews.text: SCA did not steer this wrong. I like it better than my MoccaMaster. More even brew pattern. Great temp control. Smaller footprint. Bigger capacity. Bunn is still family (USA) owned!
customer_reviews.author: Wyo Ry

customer_reviews.title: Brews a great cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this new coffee maker. My 20+ year old Procter Silex American made pot finally got replaced. It’s a little slow but I didn’t want a pot that stays hot all the time. Brews a great cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: spoin

customer_reviews.title: finally a hot cup of coffee...
customer_reviews.text: I had a $75 Cuisinart coffee maker for years and was always putting my coffee in the micro wave after a few minutes... not anymore...
customer_reviews.author: markm

customer_reviews.title: This machine will not work above 4,000 feet
customer_reviews.text: This made excellent coffee once then never worked again because we live at 6200 feel above sea level. Customer service is awesome and Amazon accepted the return without issue. The ad listing should state a 4,000 foot maximum as stated by Bunn customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Bunn needs to improve on this!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bunn coffee pots and was so excited that Bunn finally came out with a programmable one. The programmable part is great, but just making a pot of coffee takes about 15 to 20 min. to brew. I have owned it for just over a month a month now and wish I would have gone with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drip coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee in all forms, but this is one of my top favorite drip makers! Brews strong, bold, and HOT! 5 STARS! It's very simple and I like that. It's TALL and very light, deceiving when you first unbox but it's a quality cup of coffee and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: True Brew Again
customer_reviews.text: For years, my husband worked out of town, and instead of wasting coffee, I finally broke down and bought a Keurig. It was okay, but I missed a fresh true brewed cup of coffee. Luckily, husband retired from the road and this was my first purchase. No more Keurig. I love that it’s programmable AND A BUNN! Coffee was soooo good this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Very good coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews correct. Difficult to see the amount of water to use. Non drip spout is very good but when pouring last amount of hot coffee steam does come back on my hand. Overall a great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: JNS

customer_reviews.title: Would have paid a little more for an all stainless steel tank
customer_reviews.text: Works well. would have given it a 5 star if the water heater tank would have been all stainless steel instead of plastic. smells like plastic for the first week or so when brewing after that no more smell. it is a nice unit! Would have paid a little more for an all stainless steel tank though!! Snap on lid would have been a helpful access for cleaning the water tank. coffee is great from it!
customer_reviews.author: Blon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  machine no complains love it
customer_reviews.text: Coffee taste great love it. Some people complained water splashes when adding water. There are grates on both sides of the steps in the middle pour water there no splashing. Great machine no complaints
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Love the design, ease of use, and taste. HIGHLY RECOMMEND and I never take the time to write reviews, but this one deserves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Saving 30% on coffee grounds
customer_reviews.text: Title is no joke. For the same volume of water I only need to add 2 scoops of coffee grounds instead of 3, so I am using 1/3rd less every day. Coffee comes out tasting very smooth. I thought it was hype but the design of this coffee maker really does improve the taste, and is even saving me money. It's somewhat expensive at full price but if you can find it on sale for under $100 jump on it.
customer_reviews.author: TrialBySword

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly better brew
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a coffee snob but I do like my espresso. I didn’t expect a difference with the “automatic pour over method” but it did make a better cup of coffee. It takes a little bit longer to brew but who really cares. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: After trying many other brands (Mr. Coffee, Hamilton Beach etc.) I decided to pay a little bit more and give Bunn a try. So glad I did! I love this coffeemaker - easy to prepare a pot, easy to clean and coffee tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Ali S

customer_reviews.title: From a barista to their parents, an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like making large batches of coffee at home because of the poor quality of many at-home brewers. The Bunn brewer has many qualities that I need to recreate good coffee at home. It even impressed my parents! Pros: - Excellent temperature stability - Large coffee capacity - Excellent water distribution - Easy to clean Cons: - It does take 10 minutes to brew coffee
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Bunn has made a good product for the consumer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this coffee maker for 6 months now and it's working as advertised. It brings the water up to the correct temp making a very consistent cup of coffee. Controls are easy to use. Bunn has made a good product for the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: Love our new coffee maker. I enjoy the programmable option to have it ready when I wake up. I haven’t cleaned it yet so cannot comment on that. The only issue, as I read in other reviews, is the way the steam rises out of the pot when you are pouring that last cup. It isn’t that big a deal and I work around it but only reason I didn’t give it a 5 star. Redesign of this would be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Beck

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the coffee is no hotter than a cheap coffee maker. We had the maker for 1 month and it keeps dripping for 15 minutes after it is supposed to be done. We cleaned it like the manual says, and it still drips for 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: greg a goelzer

customer_reviews.title: best coffee pot ever i had old moldle it lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: best coffee pot ever i had old moldle it lasted 5 years i love the tasted of heet and brew
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Janish

customer_reviews.title: Love the auto start
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't brew a pot of coffee as fast as the older version. Takes about 7 minutes as you have to wait for the water to heat up. Hard to "steal" a cup while brewing. Bunn is by far still the best. Love the auto start feature. Also has auto shut off, which I didn't realize when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Bunn with a timer!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I would like this particular Bunn, turns out I love it. I love being able to set it the night before and having fresh brewed coffee when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. It overflows out of the basket all over the counter; randomly. It requires cleaning very frequently and always has grounds in the pot. Overall, at this price point, horrible.
customer_reviews.author: BLY

customer_reviews.title: Bunn coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I’d rather go with the older bunn. Coffee pot IS NOT drip proof and lid keeps popping off. Bunn go back to engineering dept for this one. I love the design though
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We could never get our coffee strong enough
customer_reviews.text: We put as many spoonfuls of coffee in the basket as we could and still couldn't get a strong brew. I loved the style of the coffee maker-it took up less room on our counter than our previous one. Easy to clean. Very disappointed the coffee wasn't strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a coffee maker that makes coffee that actually tastes good. I found it with this Bunn. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy V.

customer_reviews.title: set  timer for automatic brew...
customer_reviews.text: It's a Bunn coffee maker... I have always loved coffee made from Bunn coffee makers, so I decided it would be nice to have an automatic.....sometimes it is difficult to know for sure that it is set to brew on automatic.... and it would be really god if the warmer plate stayed on for longer than 2 hours..... Coffee is good tho, and I still love Bunn...
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: 21st century Bunn coffee maker. Perfect for my home ☕
customer_reviews.text: I could taste a difference on the first pot. And no dripping from the "no drip" coffee makers. I set the timer and have coffee waiting for me. It does take 10+ minutes to brew. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Just say no
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The top of the carafe constantly falls off and was a waste of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall 4 star. Kind of basic, feel like you pay for the name. Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: it broke within a week after we got it, i need it to return it and the date expired to soon, i would like to get a new one i think this product was defective
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow and leaky
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker takes about 20 minutes to brew one pot of coffee, now can no longer use the timer feature since the water will leak “cold” on to the grounds. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Bunn coffee brewer. It is the best coffee taste outside of cowboy coffee. Easy to make and easy to clean. The only down side is you have to wait for it to finish brewing to get your first cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Graves

customer_reviews.title: A nice hot coffee every time!!
customer_reviews.text: A great coffee maker.... does make a nice hot cup. Timer works every time, wake up and your coffee is ready. The only place I could find the Bunn deep cone paper filters you need is online.... of course Amazon sells them for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: By far my Favorite coffee pot! Would recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gottlob

customer_reviews.title: Not as fast as previous models , but well improved.
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker . Its does not have water heated 24 /7 . Only heats it before brewing , but I dont mind waiting a few more minutes. I'd prefer it this way , so I'm not wasting electric power . Love the timer, waking up to coffee already made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Not like a normal bunn
customer_reviews.text: Item is not like a normal Bunn. Takes to long to make coffee. But overall good coffee pot just not like the normal bunn
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: After having a few different coffee pots recently. It is great having coffee at the proper temperature. Gets plenty hot but does not burn the coffee. None of the others we tried got it hot enough. Well made and keeps the coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffeemaker!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new BUNN !! Works great, coffee is hot (which was very importAnt to my husband). We’ve been looking to buy a BUNN for some time & are so glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still like it!
customer_reviews.text: Our hard water clogs it often. We have to do a cleanings every 4 days...
customer_reviews.author: Micheller

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: Makes the most flavorful coffee I’ve ever had. I would definitely buy one again but I hope I don’t have to for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Martin

customer_reviews.title: AAAA+++
customer_reviews.text: This coffee machine is great. Fast, reliable. The coffee tastes just like in those fancy coffee shops.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. It really makes a good cup of coffee. I like strong coffee so I add more coffee than what they suggest. It is very tall. It fits perfectly under my cabinets but I sure would measure your space if you want to put on counter under cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Billy H.

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I will not order another one of these bunn coffee pots. I love bunn but not this one. Inconvenient to use, clean, and stops up extremely quickly. I spend far too much time cleaning this pot, but the original Bunn was not this bad.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Lockley

customer_reviews.title: awesome coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: awesome coffee maker however it doesnt get as hot as it claims too
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: programmable feature is poor
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee but difficult to program another time into the automatic setting. The time setting only goes forward so you have to hold clock button down to go through the whole 24 hour cycle.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: got this in Oct. worked great, its now Dec.- dont work very well!! all i wanted is coffee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker I have used in my life...and I am 72 and have had a lot of coffee makers!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Kish

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot is nothing like the classic Bunn. If you are considering buying the new version don’t do it. It’s a lot slower brewing and is not as sturdy as the old Bunn. Feels cheap. Wish I wouldn’t have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Marin

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coffee, comes out at a great temp. Has great taste! Love the 2 hour timer it has on the warmer so I can keep going back and drinking all morning.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time or Money
customer_reviews.text: It is so sloooow. Like over 15 minutes to brew a pot. I'm over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Luper

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker. Use it every morning. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a drip coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great auto coffee maker. Easy to use, coffee is very hot and taste correct.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use makes a large pot of coffee easy to clean and maintain
customer_reviews.text: Like the timer makes a large pot if you buy good coffee beans. You’ll have great coffee
customer_reviews.author: Lucy O.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a expensive machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look. Fits in with my stainless appliances. Very happy with it. I accidentally ordered 2 machines, just waiting for refund of one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bunn makes good coffee.
customer_reviews.text: There was no instruction manual with item. We had to go on line to figure out how to run, settings and general cleaning. Lid is in the way when you pour water into the top.
customer_reviews.author: joyce pearson

customer_reviews.title: This coffee maker is top of the line.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker produces a good coffee in a short amoint of time. I like the fact that it does nor take up a lot of counter space like other brands do.
customer_reviews.author: BJ  Wold

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes for a perfect pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This Bunn HB is a great coffee maker. We don't even miss the pause brew function our last coffee maker had. It's best feature is the 200 degree water temperature.
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker! The timer feature is perfect for forgetfuls like myself! Bunn is known for their coffee products and as usual they delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it, no problems at all. So glad I bought it. It is a little tall for my cabinets, so I moved it else where.
customer_reviews.author: Christa M.

customer_reviews.title: If you want coffee fast use very hot water.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted in a coffee pot except takes a few minutes to heat unlike older Bunns with a heater resovior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not getting a full 10 cups of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I put in the recommended amount of water but I don't get the full 10 cups of coffee. If you overload the water bin then you do. Other than that, the coffee tastes great, the programmer works well. No other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive look on counter, Bunn always a winner.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the coffee maker and the timer to program. I like Bunn.
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH CZYZEWSKI

customer_reviews.title: This was too tall!
customer_reviews.text: It was too tall to fit on my counter under my cabinets. Should have measured before ordering but didn't think I needed to! Looked nice and I was sad to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Green

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months water leaks thru to filter by morning. Now it also leaves 1-2 cups of water in the top and brews a ‘short’ pot every time. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: kristina conrad

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like it did on the website and it bruised coffee pot in about 10 minutes and it's hot and it is good coffee
customer_reviews.author: Steve Epperson

customer_reviews.title: A great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Brews a great cup of coffee, perfect temp every time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok if not wanting coffee
customer_reviews.text: Nice coffee maker but is way to slow for me I will go back to my other bunn
customer_reviews.author: marty roberts

product_meta.title: BUNN Heat N Brew Programmable Coffee Maker, 10 cup, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Wake up to a perfect cup of Coffee with bunn s newly designed heat N brew programmable 10-cup coffeemaker. For over 60 years BUNN has consistently and reliably brewed great tasting coffee for millions of people in their favorite restaurants and cafes. You can count on the brewing experts at BUNN to help you make the same great tasting coffee at home for your family, friends or just for you. This coffeemaker features a digital clock with a programmable brew start time. Heat N brew technology heats all the water to the perfect brewing temperature and then starts the BUNN brewing process. This coffeemaker doesn T need to stay plugged in on the counter, making it ideal for those who don't brew every day.
feature_bullets: Digital clock with programmable brew start time for Coffee that s ready when you are each morning
Brews 10 perfect cups in about 10 minutes when not using the programmable start feature
Auto warmer plate turns on during brewing and off after 2 hours.Wattage Output: 1300 watts
Exclusive shatter-resistant drip-free carafe delivers the cleanest pour on the market
3-Year backed by Bunn customer service in Springfield, IL

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars535 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
